sentences.sContent: The dough would sour quickly in such weather.
sentences.sContent_eng: The dough would sour quickly in such weather.
sentences.sCn: 在这种天气生面团会很快发酵。

sentences.sContent: Suzanne likes the feel of the dough as she makes bread.
sentences.sContent_eng: Suzanne likes the feel of the dough as she makes bread.
sentences.sCn: 苏珊娜喜欢制造面包时的生面团的那种感觉。

sentences.sContent: So he skipped from the oven & into bread dough all ready to rise in the night kitchen.
sentences.sContent_eng: So he skipped from the oven & into bread dough all ready to rise in the night kitchen.
sentences.sCn: 于是，他从烤箱里跳出来，跳进生面团，整个人连着生面团在深夜厨房里飞起来。

words.tran: 面团似的；柔软的；苍白的；半熟的

trans.tranOther: a mixture of flour and water ready to be baked into bread,  pastry  etc
